course_description: This is a 2-credit course intended for new student members of the Emory College Honor Council. It introduces students to academic integrity as a field of research and inquiry, the historical context of college honor systems, and new research and trends concerning academic dishonesty.
sections: Class Nbr: 3340, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 5:30-7:15p, Instructor: Team, Status: Open
